name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Theos AI: LinkedIn, Instagram, and WhatsApp Sales Copilot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Theos Sales Copilot is a chrome extension designed for SDRs and appointment setters to automate and enhance their LinkedIn, Instagram and WhatsApp outreach.

It uses AI to generate personalized messages, send bulk invitations, and manage follow-ups, all while seamlessly integrating with the LinkedIn, Instagram and WhatsApp's interface.

Send hundreds of invitation, chat and follow-up messages per day with human-like AI and book 10x more sales calls, close 10x more deals, 10x faster (without getting banned by LinkedIn, Instagram or WhatsApp).

Watch the video tutorial to learn more!
